notes: Stacks with other cast range increasing items or with ability specific talents. Does not stack with the cast range bonus of Octarine Core or other Aether Lenses.
Does not stack with the cast range bonus of Octarine Core or other Aether Lenses.
Does not increase the ability's radius or area of effect. Does not increase the cast range of active attack modifiers.
Does not increase the cast range of active attack modifiers.
abilities.description: Increases targeted spell and item cast range by 225.

name: Aether Lens
description: Polished with the incantation of his final breath, the gift of a dying mage to his sickly son.
